item.title: Success born out of failure
item.description:
You might think that as the creators of Buckets, my wife and I always have our budget done daily, in great detail and stick to it perfectly. Not even close. Here’s our recent story about failure and success. Enjoy!

item.title: Buckets 0.65 — Import Improvements
item.description: We just released Buckets Beta v0.65.0 which includes over 20 fixes and improvements. Download it here or wait a few weeks for the stable version. All the changes are on the changelog.

item.title: Launching the 2021 Buckets Community Survey
item.description: We’re pleased to announce our third annual-except-for-2020-because-well-it-was-2020 Buckets Community Survey! Whether you use Buckets or not, your feedback will help us understand Buckets' strengths and weaknesses, get to know who’s using it and help determine where we go in the future.

item.title: Hi, Christy!
item.description: Just another quick update before the month is out: Buckets by the Loaf, translations, a security audit and a new face.

item.title: Buckets by the Loaf: Pricing for Everyone
item.description: For some of you, a Buckets license costs more than an entire month’s salary! Paying so much for an application that’s designed to help you save money doesn’t make much sense. To address this, we’re pleased to announce a small experiment we’ll be running over the next few months: Buckets by the Loaf.
